alert.note: Alert for Bexar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 10:33PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bexar County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1033 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cross Mountain, or 9 miles southeast of Boerne, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, San Antonio Int Airport, Leon Valley, Helotes, Fair Oaks Ranch, Kirby, Alamo Heights, Windcrest, Terrell Hills, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Cross Mountain, Olmos Park, The Dominion, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Sea World, Lackland AFB, Timberwood Park, Leon Springs, and Castle Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central Texas.
